title: Strengthening Clinical Practical Skills: Math-Integrated Project-Based Learning: Data Analysis and Storytelling

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Students can design mathematical models using real-world data and present problem-solving processes three or more times
Learners can visually represent statistical analysis results and write reports integrating two or more subject areas (mathematics-social sciences/humanities)
Teams can present pattern analysis results of collected data in storytelling format (15-minute presentation) and achieve over 80% peer evaluation satisfaction
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
